div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%

valueString.value: The EIR system to be able to communicate with other systems (such as a national health management information system [HMIS] and Expanded Programme on Immunization [EPI]) to obtain vaccination locations information and other necessary information
I will know about new vaccination locations and be informed about any updated information

The EIR system to be able to communicate with other systems (such as a national health management information system [HMIS] and Expanded Programme on Immunization [EPI]) to obtain vaccination locations information and other necessary information

The EIR system to be able to communicate with other systems (such as a national health management information system [HMIS] and Expanded Programme on Immunization [EPI]) to obtain vaccination locations information and other necessary information

valueMarkdown.value: As a Electronic immunization registry (EIR) staff, I want: >The EIR system to be able to communicate with other systems (such as a national health management information system [HMIS] and Expanded Programme on Immunization [EPI]) to obtain vaccination locations information and other necessary information so that >I will know about new vaccination locations and be informed about any updated information
